concept.title: 252.215-7011 Requirements for Submission of Proposals to the Administrative Contracting Officer and Contract Auditor.

conbody.p: As prescribed in 215.408 (5)(ii), use the following provision:
REQUIREMENTS FOR SUBMISSION OF PROPOSALS TO THE ADMINISTRATIVE CONTRACTING OFFICER AND CONTRACT AUDITOR (JAN 2018)
When the proposal is submitted, the Offeror shall also submit one copy each toâ€”
